articles.title: Congratulations to President of Maldives
articles.content:
Congratulations to President of Maldives

					
						 Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a congratulatory message to Mohamed Nasheed on his election as President of the Republic of Maldives on Oct. 31.
						 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to develop in the future, too, Kim in the message sincerely wished the president great success in his responsible work.

articles.title: Disbandment of "UN Command" Demanded
articles.content:
Disbandment of "UN Command" Demanded

					
						 Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- A DPRK delegate, addressing the meeting of the Fourth Committee of the 63rd UN General Assembly on Oct. 27, demanded the disbandment of the "UN Command" in south Korea.
						He referred to the fact that the abuse of the sacred name of the UN is going on due to the "UN Command" in south Korea. 
						
						He held that the "UN Command" is nothing but the U.S. forces command as it is a product of the Cold War.
						
						 It is generally recognized fact that the "UN Command" has no relations with the UN as far as its administration and budget, etc. are concerned, he noted, and went on:
						
						 It cannot but be an abnormal thing that the "UN Command" is still present in south Korea beyond the control of the UN though 55 years have passed since the truce in Korea.
						
						Nevertheless, the U.S. has persistently insisted on the continued existence of the above-said command. This is aimed to justify and perpetuate the U.S. forces' presence in south Korea and bring multinational forces to the Korean Peninsula with ease in any time in case of emergency.
						
						 Ever since its appearance the command has brought unspeakable misfortune to the Korean people and thrown hurdles in the way of reunification of Korea, hamstringing the implementation of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration which clarified the idea of "By our nation itself" and the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing it.
						
						The "UN Command" should be dissolved without delay as required by the resolution of the 30th UN General Assembly, he urged.

articles.title: Rural Villages Change Looks
articles.content:
Rural Villages Change Looks

					
						Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- Rural villages that are called "socialist rural village in the Songun era" have grown in number in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea in recent years.
						General Secretary Kim Jong Il visited Poman-ri, Sohung County, North Hwanghae Province in July Juche 90 (2001), where he said the village was an Arcadia, fairyland of socialism in the age of the Workers' Party of Korea.
						
						Cosy and modern rural dwelling houses, fruit trees planted around them, a fish-farm and a power station newly built in the village are well blended with each other to present beautiful scenery. Since the village was named one of the eight sceneries in the Songun era, a campaign for arranging rural villages like Poman-ri has been launched vigorously across the country.
						
						Over the last years smart rural villages have come into being in many ris including Migok-ri, Sariwon City, Unjong-ri, Pongsan County, Phyongam-ri, Koksan County, and Midang-ri,Thosan County, in North Hwanghae Province alone. Various rural villages have been arranged as socialist rural villages commensurate with the Songun era on a number of farms including Songjong Co-op Farm, Riwon County, South Hamgyong Province where a village has been constructed along the sea-beach.
						
						Similar villages have made their appearance, more than 150 at the foot of Mt. Paektu, 50 in South Phyongan Province and nearly 50 in North Phyongan Province. The construction of rural villages is in full swing.
						
						The newly built dwellings are furnished with all facilities needed for the life of peasants. Electric heating system and methane have been introduced into the recently built dwelling houses with solar heat green houses so as to cultivate vegetables even in winter.
						
						Solar cells have been installed on the roofs of the Tongsan village houses in Chongsan-ri, Kangso County, South Phyongan Province, which makes it possible to protect environment and increase the energy utilization rate. The new villages add beauty to socialist Korea.

articles.title: Provocative Hoguk Exercises Slammed
articles.content:
Provocative Hoguk Exercises Slammed

					
						 Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- The Hoguk exercises started by the south Korean puppet military on Oct. 30 are dangerous war maneuvers in the light of their provocative nature, program and scale.
						 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes this in a signed commentary.
						
						What merits attention is that during the exercises which will last till November 8 the puppet warmongers are going to stage joint landing exercises of the marine corps, the largest in its history, together with the U.S. imperialist aggression forces, the commentary notes, and goes on:
						
						The madcap Hoguk exercises kicked off by the puppet forces contrary to the will and aspiration of the whole Korean nation are very dangerous military provocative moves to wreck peace of the Korean Peninsula, escalate the inter-Korean confrontation and tension and ignite a war against the north in league with outside forces.
						
						 The Lee Myung Bak group's frenzy for north-south confrontation has gone into extremes. It is escalating its moves to provoke a war against the DPRK, refusing to drop its traitorous posture of confrontation despite the repeated warnings of the DPRK.
						
						The marine corps' landing exercises were staged every year during each south Korea-U.S. joint military exercises. But it is the first time in history that division-level exercises take place this time. 
						
						  Landing exercises are typical of exercises for offensive operation. Hoguk exercises are a very dangerous saber-rattling aiming at a surprise preemptive attack on the DPRK, to all intents and purposes.
						
						 The reality goes to prove that the Lee group is more desperately pursuing military confrontation with the DPRK than ever before and going reckless to realize the ambition for invading it at any cost in league with outside forces.
						
						 He who seeks danger perishes therein. 
						
						The Lee group would be well advised to behave itself, mindful that its moves to ignite a war against the north is as foolish an act as jumping into fire with faggot on one's back.

articles.title: U.S. Imperialists' Adventurous Scenario for Nuclear War Assailed
articles.content:
U.S. Imperialists' Adventurous Scenario for Nuclear War Assailed

					
						 Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- The U.S. bellicose forces are now contemplating setting up a new operation command for a nuclear war within one year to come. The projected U.S. nuclear operation command will reportedly specialize in commanding nuclear activities which are now looked after by five different commands and its staff is expected to be appointed soon.
						 Rodong Sinmun today observes in a signed commentary carried in this regard:
						
						 This is a dangerous action to spark a new Cold War as it is an adventurous scenario for launching a nuclear war.
						
						The U.S. imperialists are the arch criminal posing a nuclear threat to the world and bringing the danger of a nuclear arms race and war to it, the commentary notes, and goes on:
						
						What they seek in establishing the above-said command is to realize their shameless ambition for world domination with ease. During World War II the U.S. set up a strategic air forces command in order to put its overall nuclear forces under its control. During the Cold War it frantically pushed ahead with the moves for a nuclear war through the above-said command. 
						
						 The above-said measure of the U.S. is part of its evermore undisguised moves for launching a nuclear war. It has become more frantic in its moves for a nuclear war since the beginning of the new century. It is the unchanged policy and strategic purpose of the U.S. imperialists to threaten, blackmail and contain other countries with nukes and realize its ambition for world domination.
						
						U.S. Secretary of Defense Gates recently let loose a spate of outbursts that it is important for the U.S. to stockpile nuclear weapons as those countries likely to be threats to the U.S. are having access to nuclear weapons and pursuing their programs to do so and it would provide south Korea and Japan, etc. with nuclear umbrellas to cope with the "nuclear threat from north Korea." This proves that the U.S. bellicose forces seek to launch a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula at any cost.
						
						 Under the situation where they are stepping up the moves for a nuclear war, while paying lip-service to "the solution of the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula," it is natural for the DPRK to bolster the war deterrent to cope with their moves.
						
						The DPRK will steadily reinforce its war deterrent in view of the U.S. imperialists' desperate efforts to realize their scenario to seize it through a preemptive nuclear attack.

articles.title: Inter-Korean Joint Declaration Described as Powerful Weapon for Independent Reunification
articles.content:
Inter-Korean Joint Declaration Described as Powerful Weapon for Independent Reunification

					
						 Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- The historic discourse given by General Secretary Kim Jong Il to Rodong Sinmun, the organ of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and Minju Joson, the organ of the DPRK government, on September 5 serves as immortal guidelines that the Korean nation should steadily hold fast to in the efforts for independent reunification, peace and prosperity of Korea.
						 Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a signed article.
						
						 In the work Kim Jong Il clarified the most infallible and realistic way for achieving the national reunification, the supreme urgent task of the Korean nation, and opening up the road for unified development and prosperity of the nation, the article notes, and goes on:
						
						 The June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration are banner of struggle and weapon of invincibility that the Koreans should hold high in their efforts to realize the independent reunification of the country.
						
						The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors is malevolently challenging the cause of independent reunification while negating the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration, but this is no more than miserable last-ditch effort of the discarded of history whose days are numbered. Steadfast is the will of the nation to defend and implement the above-said declarations and win victory in the cause of national reunification despite any storms and outrageous challenge.
						
						The June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration are an indestructible banner for the accomplishment of the cause of independent reunification that the Koreans should always and invariably hold high as in the past, so in the future, too.

articles.title: Puppet Security Authorities' Suppression in S. Korea Blasted
articles.content:
Puppet Security Authorities' Suppression in S. Korea Blasted

					
						Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- The People's Solidarity for the Repeal of the "National Security Law" in south Korea on Oct. 29 issued statement titled "Stop at once retaliation against candlelight actions by NSL."   
						 The statement accused the security authorities of making a far-fetched assertion that the struggle staged by the south Korean Federation of the University Student Councils (Hanchongryon) for the removal of the statue of MacArthur three years ago and the protest against the trip of the U.S. president to south Korea were "instructed by the north."
						
						 This is the extension of the retaliation perpetrated by the Lee Myung Bak regime, bereft of reason, against the candlelight actions and a clear expression of the suppression launched under the pretext of "security" to calm down the people's protest against the "policy for the richest who account for one percent of the population."
						
						 The statement assailed the Lee regime for frantically suppressing under the pretext of "security" the progressive camp including the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration, which stood in the van of the candlelight actions. 
						
						 Recalling that the struggle for removing the statue and others were not conducted at the "instruction of the north" but a planned action staged according to the voluntary will of civic and public organizations of people of different circles and Hanchongryon was also involved in those actions, the statement continued: 
						
						 The recent action taken by the authorities suggests that they will strictly deal with any movement for reunification by the NSL by linking the activities of Hanchongryon with "the assertion of the north" though the above-said actions were legally held in the past with the approval of the "Ministry of Unification." 
						
						 We will join all the people who have shed sweat and blood for democracy, peace, reunification and the right to existence in this land in the struggle to frustrate the moves of the regime to revive dictatorship and crackdown upon them under the pretext of "security" and wage an all-people struggle to get the NSL, an evil law in the times and a law against democracy, reunification and people, repealed without fail, declared the statement.

articles.title: DPRK's Socialist Education System Praised
articles.content:
DPRK's Socialist Education System Praised

					
						Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- The 8th International Seminar on Education of Preschool Children was held in Nuevo Leon State, Mexico, from October 23 to 25 with delegations and delegates of at least 20 countries attending. 
						Maria Guadalupe, chairperson of its organizing committee, highly praised the DPRK's socialist education system. 
						
						She said she was struck with strong admiration at the most popular socialist education system in the DPRK, visiting it several times.
						
						She continued:
						
						Visiting schools, kindergartens and nurseries, in particular, I noticed for myself what great benefit the Workers' Party of Korea and the state are bestowing on the students and children. 
						
						President Kim Il Sung was the great father who preferentially provided the best things in the world to the children, calling them "kings" of the country. 
						
						Under the deep concern and warm loving care of General Secretary Kim Jong Il the Korean children are growing to be the happiest and most sound and talented intellectuals in the world under the excellent conditions. 
						
						It is pity that I cannot tell in such a short time all facts about the popular education system and the upbringing and education system in the DPRK, which have become a wonderful reality. 
						
						One should visit the DPRK without fail in order to witness the true picture of Korean-style socialism and know about the reality of its above-said systems.

articles.title: Debe ser disuelta "Comandancia de Fuerzas de ONU"
articles.content:
Debe ser disuelta "Comandancia de Fuerzas de ONU"

					
						Pyongyang, 3 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Al intervenir en la reunion de la cuarta comision del 63o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU, el delegado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea demando la disolucion de la "Comandancia de las Fuerzas de la ONU" en el Sur de Corea.
						 Se refirio a que esta "comandancia" sigue abusando de sagrado nombre de la ONU.
						
						 Insistio en que esta comandancia, producto de la guerra fria, es, en el sentido verdadero, la comandancia de las tropas norteamericanas.
						
						 Revelo que es la notoriedad que la "Comandancia de las Fuerzas de la ONU" no tiene nada que ver con la "ONU" en la administracion, el presupuesto y  otros  sectores y continuo:
						
						 Es anormal el hecho de que hasta hoy en que ya pasaron 55 anos desde el cese del fuego en Corea existe en el Sur de Corea dicha "Comandancia"  fuera del control de la ONU.
						
						 Pero, EE.UU. insiste tercamente en la permanencia de la "comandancia" en cuestion con el fin de racionalizar y perpetuar la permanencia de las tropas norteamericanas en el Sur de Corea y facilitar la introduccion de las fuerzas armadas multinacionales en la Peninsula Coreana en el tiempo de emergencia.
						
						 La "comandancia" del particular, desde su nacion hasta hoy, impuso innumerables desgracias al pueblo coreano y sirviendo de obstaculo en la reunificacion de Corea, impide la ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur del 15 de Junio cuyo ideal es el de "entre nosotros, los connacionales" y la Declaracion de 4 de Octubre, programa de ejecucion de la primera.
						
						 Tal "Comandancia" debe ser disuelta sin demora segun la decision del XXX periodo de las sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena al traidor Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena al traidor Lee Myung Bak

					
						Pyongyang, 3 de noviembre (ATCC) -- En una "conferencia a mesa redonda de los ministros relativos a la diplomacia y seguridad", el traidor Lee dijo: "no se dejara arrastrar por el Norte sin regla fundamental" y "mantendra el principio basico de 'la desnuclearizacion, la apertura y 3,000 dolares'". Tambien, Kim Ha Jung, ministro de "Reunificacion" senalo: "no cambiara de principio" vencido por la "censura del Norte".
						 No pasan de ser una sofisteria tales peroraciones de los traidores quienes buscan la via de salvacion en la division nacional y la confrontacion con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea (RPDC).
						
						 Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 2 y continua:
						
						Todavia, el "poder" de Lee actua imprudente sin darse cuenta de la gravedad de la situacion.
						
						 "No dejarse arrastrar por el Norte y "No cambiar de principio" de que habla tanto la banda de Lee significa que esta niega la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre y trata de realizar a toda costa su antinacional "politica hacia el Norte" para destruir las relaciones intercoreanas y provocar la guerra de agresion al Norte. 
						
						 Es ridiculo que los titeres surcoreanos justifican la teoria de la "desnuclearizacion, la apertura y 3,000 dolares", con velo de la "convivencia y coprosperidad" y la presentan como "principio de base".
						
						 La horda de Lee considera "censura" el sentido de la reiterada advertencia de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y esgrime el "principio" de todo injustificable, lo que nos da clara cuenta de que ella no tiene la voluntad de realizar el dialogo, la cooperacion y la reunificacion con el Norte.
						
						 La teoria de "defensa de principio" con que sale esa pandilla en respuesta a la justa medida de la RPDC demuestra que ella no quiere dialogar ni cooperar con el Norte sino se propone precipitar solo por el camino de la confrontacion y la guerra.
						
						 La banda de Lee, que persigue tenazmente el enfrentamiento fratricida, no podra evitar la severa sentencia de la historia.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena los "ejercicios Hoguk"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena los "ejercicios Hoguk"

					
						Pyongyang, 3 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Tanto en vista de su caracter provocativo como a la luz de su contenido y dimension, los "ejercicios Hoguk", que inicio el 30 de octubre el circulo militar titere del Sur de Corea, devienen una aventura belicista que no se puede pasar por alto.
						 Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 3 y continua:
						
						Lo que llama la atencion es que en el marco de ese simulacro a finalizarse el dia 8, los belicistas titeres libraran junto con las tropas agresoras estadounidenses el ejercicio combinado de desembarco de los infantes de marina de maxima envergadura en la historia.
						
						El "simulacro Hoguk", que se despliega demencialmente pisoteando la voluntad y el deseo de todos los coreanos, resulta una peligrosisima provocacion militar para tronchar la paz de la Peninsula Coreana, agravar la confrontacion y la tension entre el Norte y el Sur y desencadenar la guerra contra la RPDC en contubernio con las fuerzas foraneas.
						
						Ahora, llega al extremo el fanatismo de la banda de Lee Myung Bak por enfrentarse con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
						
						A pesar de las reiteradas advertencias de esta, esa horda recurre a la escalada de sus campanas para desatar la guerra de agresion al Norte sin abandonar su antinacional posicion conflictiva.
						
						 Si bien no faltaba hasta ahora el entrenamiento de desembarco en los ejercicios militares conjuntos Sur de Corea-EE.UU. que tuvieron lugar anualmente, es la primera vez en la historia que adquiere el nivel de division.
						
						 Si se toma en cuenta que el desembarco es una de las tipicas operaciones de ataque, resulta evidente que el "simulacro Hoguk" es el aventurero ejercicio belico para dar el golpe preventivo y sorpresivo a la RPDC.
						
						La realidad demuestra claramente que la banda de Lee persigue cada dia mas perversamente la confrontacion militar con la RPDC y actua imprudentemente para realizar a toda costa su ambicion de agredirla en contubernio con las fuerzas foraneas.
						
						 Es natural que se muera quemado el que prefiere las llamas.
						
						La banda de Lee debe actuar con prudencia teniendo presente que sus alborotos belicos anti- RPDC son la tonteria de lanzarse al fuego con gasolina.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia intencion de EE.UU. de desatar guerra nuclear
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia intencion de EE.UU. de desatar guerra nuclear

					
						Pyongyang, 3 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Las fuerzas belicistas estadounidenses intentan instalar dentro de un ano una nueva comandancia de operaciones para la guerra nuclear, que se ocupara exclusivamente de las actividades nucleares de que ahora se encargan 5 comandancias, y se denominaran pronto los miembros de la nueva direccion, se dice.
						El diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual publicado este lunes lo califica de una aventurera intencion de guerra nuclear y de un peligroso acto para acarrear una nueva guerra fria. 
						
						EE.UU. es precisamente el culpable de la amenaza nuclear en el ambito internacional, autor de la carrera armamentista nuclear y del peligro de la guerra nuclear, senala el comentario y continua:
						
						EE.UU. trata de constituir la comandancia de operaciones nucleares con el fin de realizar facilmente su descarada ambicion de dominio al mundo. 
						
						Durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial EE.UU. instalo la comandancia estrategica de fuerzas aereas para controlar sus fuerzas armadas nucleares en conjunto y, a base de ello, en el periodo de la guerra fria desarrollo freneticamente las maniobras de guerra nuclear. 
						
						La creacion de la nueva comandancia de operaciones nucleares es la continuacion de sus maniobras de guerra nuclear que se hacen cada dia mas abiertas. 
						
						En el nuevo siglo se tornan mas freneticas las maniobras de guerra nuclear de EE.UU. 
						
						Amenazar, chantajear y aplastar con el garrote nuclear a otros paises y lograr su ambicion de dominar al mundo es la invariable politica y objetivo estrategico de EE.UU. 
						
						Hace poco, el secretario de Defensa estadounidense Gates dijo que dado que los paises que puedan ejercer "amenaza" a EE.UU. poseen las armas nucleares o lo persiguen, es importante que EE.UU. cuente con las armas nucleares, y que EE.UU. seguiria ofreciendo al Sur de Corea y Japon el "paraguas nuclear" frente a la "amenaza nuclear del Norte de Corea". 
						
						El hecho comprueba que las fuerzas belicistas estadounidenses intentan desatar de todas maneras una guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana. 
						
						 Dado que las fuerzas belicistas norteamericanas recurren a las maniobras de guerra nuclear hablando de la "solucion del problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana", es natural que la RPDC fortalece la fuerza disuasiva de guerra. 
						
						La RPDC la consolidara por todos los medios para frustrar la ambicion de EE.UU. de agredir a Corea  mediante el ataque preventivo nuclear.
